meanings.definition: To become pale or white in color.
meanings.sent1: The girl blanches when she sees a spider.
meanings.sent2: The snow blanches the landscape in winter.
meanings.sent3: The thought of eating bugs blanches her face.
meanings.sent4: The fear blanches his courage in an instant.
meanings.sent5: The sudden news blanches his expression with shock.

meanings.definition: To cook briefly in boiling water or steam.
meanings.sent1: She blanches the vegetables before stir-frying.
meanings.sent2: The chef blanches the pasta for a few seconds.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally blanches his finger while cooking.
meanings.sent4: The steam blanches the seafood to perfection.
meanings.sent5: Blanches the broccoli to retain its vibrant color.

meanings.definition: To bleach or whiten by removing color.
meanings.sent1: She blanches the fabric to remove the stain.
meanings.sent2: The sunlight blanches the curtains over time.
meanings.sent3: The bleach accidentally blanches his favorite shirt.
meanings.sent4: The artist blanches the canvas to start anew.
meanings.sent5: The chemical solution blanches the paper for preservation.
